description: This file defines the main route component for the note organizer frontend application, handling authentication, data loading, state management, and rendering the main UI consisting of Navbar, Sidebar, NotesList, and NoteEditor components.

methods.name: loadBasicData
methods.description: Loads folders and tags data from API and updates signals.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes based on current filters and sorts them by update date.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Updates search query signal for filtering notes.

methods.name: onNewNote
methods.description: Creates a new untitled note and updates state accordingly.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and updates the notes list.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Selects a note by ID for editing.

methods.name: onDraftChange
methods.description: Updates the draft note content as user edits.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves the current draft to the server and updates local state.

methods.name: onAddFolder
methods.description: Prompts for folder name, creates a new folder, and updates folder list.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears authentication and redirects to login.
